alert.note: Alert for Greer; Washita (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 15 at 8:29PM CDT until June 15 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN WASHITA...NORTHWESTERN KIOWA...NORTHEASTERN GREER AND SOUTHEASTERN BECKHAM COUNTIES... At 829 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles north of Granite, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hobart, Granite, Sentinel, Lone Wolf, Carter, Rocky, Willow, Retrop, Brinkman, and Altus-Lugert Lake. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A tornado watch remains in effect for the warned area. Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
